title: Episode #49: A Panel at NYU on "Law and Strategy in the Executive Branch"
itunes:title: Episode #49: A Panel at NYU on "Law and Strategy in the Executive Branch"
itunes:subtitle: In an panel discussion at NYU, a former White House Counsel, a former chief of staff to the CIA director and Secretary of Defense, a former FBI general counsel, and a former head of NCTC discuss law and lawyering and national security strategy.
description:
In an panel discussion at NYU, a former White House Counsel, a former chief of staff to the CIA director and Secretary of Defense, a former FBI general counsel, and a former head of NCTC discuss law and lawyering and national security strategy.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/lawfare.
